title: Wrong Number 2
description: Don’t answer that phone!“You’re not safe anywhere. I’ll get my revenge!”Can it really be Mr. Farberson on the line? He has to still be locked up after trying to kill Jade and Deena last year. Maybe the calls are just someone’s idea of a sick joke. But who else could possibly know the things the caller knows?Then they realize that someone is nearby, watching them, close enough to know their every move. Someone who desperately wants revenge. Someone who wants to reach out…and kill them.
author: R.L. Stine
